thread.title: Northeast Albania covered in snow, dropping temperatures bring premature winter - Telegraph
thread.title_full: Northeast Albania covered in snow, dropping temperatures bring premature winter - Telegraph

author: Elfije Boletini
title: Northeast Albania covered in snow, dropping temperatures bring premature winter - Telegraph
text:
Northeast Albania covered in snow, dropping temperatures bring early winter
Temperatures have suffered a significant drop in the northeastern areas of the country, which have been hit by rain and snow.
At altitudes above 1000 meters above sea level, precipitation has been mainly in the form of snow.
The remote administrative units such as Shishtaveci, Zapoti, Topojani, Gryk-Qaji, Arreni and Kalisi have been covered in snow, creating a truly wintery appearance. So far, no problems with traffic or supply have been reported.
However, drivers are advised to exercise caution while driving, due to the humidity and possibility of ice on the road. /Tch/
